---
title: "2022-2023"
---

<body>

  <div class="full-img" id="fullImgBox">
  <html>
    <img src="../Images/Project_Showcase/2023/FaceRecognition.jpg" id="fullImg">
    <span onclick="closeFullImg()">X</span>
  </html>
  </div>
  
  <div class="img-gallery">
  <html>
    <img src="../Images/Project_Showcase/2023/FaceRecognition.jpg" onclick="openFullImg(this.src)">
    <img src="../Images/Project_Showcase/2023/FastFood.jpg" onclick="openFullImg(this.src)">
    <img src="../Images/Project_Showcase/2023/MovieThemes.jpg" onclick="openFullImg(this.src)">
    <img src="../Images/Project_Showcase/2023/PopularityAnalysis.jpg" onclick="openFullImg(this.src)">
  </html>
  </div>
  
<script>
  var fullImgBox = document.getElementById("fullImgBox");
  var fullImg = document.getElementById("fullImg");
  
  function openFullImg(pic){
    fullImgBox.style.display = "flex";
    fullImg.src = pic
  }
  
  function closeFullImg(){
  fullImgBox.style.display = "none";
  }
</script>

</body>
